description: A revolver rifle made in germany, the Nachtschutze-308 is a powerful five shot revolver rifle, chambered in the powerful .308 round. It was marketed primarily towards those who wanted to get a good shot from afar at night. While it didn't come with a supressor, or a night vision scope, at least not here in the states, those were still heavily marked towards purchasers of the gun.

A revolver rifle made in germany, the Schleudergewehr-556 is a powerful nine shot revolver rifle, chambered in 5.56 NATO ammunition. Advertised for home defense, due to the affordability of it's ammo, its relatively popular among hobbyist shooters.

A revolver rifle made in germany, the Schleudergewehr-50 is a powerful four shot revolver rifle, chambered in .50 BMG. Being as heavy as it is, it was advertised as a revolver for the big game hunter, or the marksman with an eye on power.

A revolver rifle made in germany, the Drachenkanone-700 is a powerful three shot revolver rifle, chambered in .700 Nitro Express. It was sold for exceptionally high prices as a weapon for the rich and eccentric. It has an incredibly long barrel, allowing for long ranged, incredibly accurate shots.
